text: "Point Blank" is a 1981 song by Bruce Springsteen and was taken from his fifth studio album The River. It was released as a single in Europe and despite not being released as a single in the United States it went to number 20 on the Billboard Mainstream Rock Tracks chart. ==References== Category:1981 songs Category:Rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Point Blank (Bruce Springsteen song)
